Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper, and Dark Claw stood at the base of Mt. St. Hilary, 
the place where the Ark crashed and was revived four million years later.  At 
least, according to real history.  But now the Ark was on Luna.  So, who knew 
how history was going to change.  It would though.  There was absolutely no 
way the Cybertronians could completely fix it.

Demon Wulf gave a sick smile.  And there was no way he would let them even 
try to fix it.  He looked back to his brethren.

"We will rest, and save up strength in our craft that lies in the core of 
this mountain structure.  My brethren, when we awake, with a renewed vigour 
we will crush all Cybertronians."

===

Meanwhile, in Brazil, South America, the three bounty hunters awaited their 
craft at the site where they had originally been dropped off and then 
proceeded to kill Savanah and Spitfire.

Or at least that's what Imprisoner thought there names were.  They were just 
two faceless Maximal pieces of trash to him.

"When will our ship get here?"

"Oh, about twenty-eight mega-cycles."

"Great." Predator replied.  "Good job Choran, you could've at least told us 
beforehand so we'd have a base to stay in."

"Shut up the both of you!  They probably wouldn't have let us leave anyway.  
Let's just sit here and wait."
